articles.description: SGX Nifty indicates a mildly negative start for the broader index with a loss of 83 points after Nifty closed 15 points higher at 17,828 on Thursday. Markets in the US, Europe ended flat to negative on Friday, while Asian peers trading marginally up this morn…
